website_summaries.verdict: The stylish, comfortable, on-ear Urbanears Plattan 2 headphones deliver bass and balance at an affordable price.
pros: Can be linked to another pair for shared listening

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth Nonexistent
customer_reviews.text: These will be getting returned straight away. They can’t even connect to my iPhone 7. Tried connecting them to my wife’s phone too but no luck. Literally had them resting on my phone and they can’t even link. Phone has latest software and tried turning everything off and on again, blah blah. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie O'Neill

customer_reviews.title: Why bother spending double on more known brands?
customer_reviews.text: This must be the 4th pair of wireless headsets I've tried and even though they are the cheapest once I've tried so far they are far better than the others in my opinion. Not only do these come in a great assortment of colours, they fit snug and have good sound. Great for using in the office or while commuting.
customer_reviews.author: Britttsle

customer_reviews.title: Tasty looking bit of kit but difficult to pair with some devices
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely packaged, headphones look expensive and great design. The problem is that the control switch is not as responsive as it should be. I bought these for the bluetooth functionality, no problem pairing with IPhone and laptop. I have a new LG smart tv which pairs with everything else instantly, but not these headphones. After a whole day of trying I eventually managed to click search on the tv and earphones at the correct time to pair. Other than that great range and good all round for the price. Service from seller and Amazon Prime outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for its attractive design. But was hugely disappointed by the lack of robust Bluetooth connection. In a matter of 30 minutes travelling in train, the connection dropped at least 20 times, and I had to manually reconnect every time. Even inside the house it kept dropping. Returned the product next day. Amazon were quick to refund.
customer_reviews.author: Bhargav Dave

customer_reviews.title: Good while they lasted.
customer_reviews.text: I have had these for just over 2 years. They were really good while they worked. I have always taken very good care of them, and havent even been used that much. Just tried to use them because my wireless ones needed charging, and found sound is now only coming out from the side the wire is attached too. Now on the hunt for a new pair, but wouldn't want to go back to these.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Looks gorgeous, good sound performance & reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this headset! I was skeptic about the quality and the sound performance but since I really wanted to have a blue color headset, that didn’t really count. But when I used first time, it turned out to be perfect choice for my new headset, it looks so gorgeous with a bit dark blue color and even the sound quality is really good!!!! And some people here claim that it doesn’t connect to other device after connecting with the first device but I’d say it’s not true, it can be connected to any device with Bluetooth! I use it with both my phone and laptop :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Break so quickly
customer_reviews.text: So, I love these headphones but they break so quickly. I thought that with the new ones they'd solve the problems but no. The skip button broke almost immediately and now it doesnt work at all so I can't pause. I know this seems like first world problems but it is just really annoying. Also your ears do start to hurt if you wear them for too long, which is another first world problem but I'm a student and need this in the library.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working just after the return date
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Urbanears Plattan 2 Wired Headphones set my son has owned - the first set lasted a while but volume on one side lowered, then failed entirely; we thought enough of the first set that we took a risk and bought a second set but the same problem arose, this time after only four weeks. The quality of the second set was also very poor, with the on-ear cushioning falling apart. Disappointed. I have bought other UE products and they're good, but this product has been a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Richard, London

customer_reviews.title: Simple elegant design, works well
customer_reviews.text: Overall pleased with these headphones, I have given 3 stars for sound quality as I expected them to be louder, however this has only been used with my phone over the bluetooth and therefore probably not giving them a fair trial. I do like the fact they are neat and compact and subtly designed. They work with an external jack as well, perfect for on an plane.
customer_reviews.author: russ blakey

customer_reviews.title: Generally comfortable, generally work fine
customer_reviews.text: These headphones can get a bit painful after about 2 hours of wear, but the battery life is incredible. I seem to hardly ever re-charge them. About 3 months after purchase, I noticed the Bluetooth connection occasionally cutting out but if you purchase a cord you can listen wired as well just in case. They're pretty stylish and fold up small.
customer_reviews.author: Perdita Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Ideal headphones
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are so light and comfortable to wear, they block out noise very well and the quality of the music is clear and loud if needed. The design is simple and tasteful and I feel comfortable wearing them in private and in public. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ellie Bird

customer_reviews.title: Sound cuts out
customer_reviews.text: At first I really liked these headphones but I have only had them for about 2 months and I have started to notice that recently the sound cuts out all the time. It is really frustrating. It will only cut out for a second or so but it makes a weird sound that is really uncomfortable to hear and will have several times before they properly reconnect. Really disappointed as I had a wired versions of these before and they were great but would not recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Liam Bright

customer_reviews.title: Low Quality Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Overall a bad set of headphones. When they arrived, they would not connect to any device and randomly after 2 days of trying they connected. During this time I tried contacting Amazon and they have an option to call or chat; the call option never works and the chat has a very unhelpful person on the other side. Been using it for a month, it is relatively comfortable on my head and has good battery life, but poor sound quality and often loses connection for no reason and the power button plays up all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Billal Ahmed

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth Failure
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed, these headphones simply don't function. The Bluetooth range is so poor they practically have to be touching the sound source. I spent over an hour resetting and fiddling with my I Phone to try and get a better result. I couldn't even get half way through one song. I should have read previous reviews as this is not just my device or headphones. Returned for refund instantly. It's such a shame as I've owned non Bluetooth Urbanear headphones for years and they are brilliant. This product does not have an additional function for plugging in a device and does not come with a cable as stated.
customer_reviews.author: Chantel

customer_reviews.title: Stupid good
customer_reviews.text: Got these to replace an older model that was on its way out. I’ve never had any good luck with headphones. I use them every single day pretty much all day and these are the ONLY brand that have lasted me years. Won’t buy anything else when it comes to headphones! The box was a little crushed but that’s to be expected. I’ve seen images of bent headphones from other reviewers but please be aware the more you use them the better the fit will be. Put them on! The dents will disappear after use!
customer_reviews.author: Georgina

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are really good headphones for the price, they have great sound quality and good base. After wearing them for longer than 30 minutes my ears begin to hurt as the ear padding does not go over my ears but rather squashes them into my head and causes a lot of discomfort. I have to push through the pain if I want to keep listening to music. I would have to buy a another pair of headphones where the padding actually goes around my ears
customer_reviews.author: Lewis R Brown

customer_reviews.title: Love Urbanears
customer_reviews.text: i love these. My previous headphone was the Urbanears with the cord, and i used that one for 3 years until the skin wore off because of sweat (i was using it when i was running) so i decided to buy a new one. this is the exact same with my previous one, only cordless. The sound quality is amazing, they are very comfy as always and i love the design. it wasn't at all hard to connect to the phone at first. You just need to put it on battery first and then connect to bluetooth and you are good to enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Seda

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: I love my headphones. They are great. The colour is lovely and different. I have quite small ears and wear glasses so most headphones hurt my ears/head after a while. However, I can wear these for hours and have no issue. They are very comfy. I really like that they bend so easier to store and carry. The battery life also lasts for ages! No issues pairing with Bluetooth devices. I have paired these with laptops & mobile phones.
customer_reviews.author: Kyri

customer_reviews.title: Good set of headphones
customer_reviews.text: I'm a fan of these - they look nice, they're comfy and I've charged it once since I bought them so it appears the battery life is more than 30 hours. Only qualms are that I cannot seem to connect them to my laptop and it took a really long time to connect them to my phone too. Also if the volume is too low on the music it has a humming noise but apparently that is common in most bluetooth headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Very expensive for what they are. Not big enough to cover your ears to cancel noise, they don’t feel like they’re secure on your head while wearing, poor range i.e if you walk more than 2m away from the device you’re paired with it will cut out, not obvious how to switch them off, hardly any instructions included. Includes USB charge cable but not a mini jack which would of been handier. I’ve bought better wireless headphones for £30, wouldn’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: M Rose

customer_reviews.title: Blue tooth does not work
customer_reviews.text: I ignored the reviews about the bluetooth not working and its true it does not work don't waste your time very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: natalievesna

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I really like these and was recommended by a music student who needs good quality headphones. The only thing is that they do rub on my ears after wearing them for a long time. But really good otherwise
customer_reviews.author: January

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant service
customer_reviews.text: My first set stopped working - they asked me to destroy them by cutting them in half, sending a photo to them and a new set arrived in a couple of days. New set have been brilliant so good service and good product.
customer_reviews.author: AlanK

customer_reviews.title: Solid headphones, better controls than previous model
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought these to replace my older model Plattan ADV's, and the new model has all the good features of those (good sound, noise cancellation, stays on my head when I'm running) and much better controls – the old ones had a panel on one earphone that was triggered by anything touching off of it, this has a button that acts like a little joystick. I remain a loyal customer. They are a little bit tight, but I just need to remember to take them off for a while after an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Whelan

customer_reviews.title: repair needed for right ear connection after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Overall, the quality of these headphones is pretty good. however, about 6 months after purchase and somewhat frequent use, the right ear connection inside the headphone headband became disjointed and ultimately stopped working. I don't consider myself to be a rough handler of headphones, so it may be a fault with the product. Something to be aware of with otherwise good headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe Carter

customer_reviews.title: oh wow!
customer_reviews.text: I simply cannot believe this kind of sound quality and comfort exist on that price level. They are amazing, juicy, soft, deep, clear, balanced, they take all my favourite tracks and turn them into pure joy. Love the product!
customer_reviews.author: Shiro

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous sound and trendy design, happy audiophile!
customer_reviews.text: my headphones arrived promptly in powder pink and i am seriously impressed considering the price point especially! think this is at par with pretty top of the line headphones. sound quality is crisp and clear with lovely bass and treble, design is comfortable and super stylish to boot. I'm really impressed! no bluetooth feature but i don't really like using this anyway as it drains my battery. if they made a rose gold or tan version i'd totally buy another pair. really good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Allado

customer_reviews.title: Bright and clear
customer_reviews.text: Love 'em. Brighter colour red than I had expected but only makes me love them even more. Liking the design tweak to headphone jack that means it fits snuggly into my ipad. Clear sound. I'm a diehard Urbanears fan (this is my 3rd pair). I feel like the hippest 55 year old on the block!
customer_reviews.author: Reddskin

customer_reviews.title: They fit!
customer_reviews.text: These are the first headphones I've found in 20 years that actually fit my tiny head! The sound quality is excellent and I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Jess Neale

customer_reviews.title: Great gym headphones
customer_reviews.text: Bit difficult to connect at first but think it was my phone. Once sorted they’ve been great- easy to use and last ages. They also stay out when working out which is essential
customer_reviews.author: RMc

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I just did not get on with these at all. I couldn’t even wear them for an hour before being uncomfortable so I returned them unfortunately. I really like the colour but everything else just really wasn’t going to work for me if it wasn’t comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Review

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Very disapointed with them, as i had older model, and was much better. At around 75% volume sound distorted. Well build.
customer_reviews.author: Zenon Swatek

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but a little bit expensive in comparison with other brands
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, but I found I can't change the songs directly from the headphones buttoms. Good quality but a little bit expensive in comparison with other brands(eg Sony which are the top budged products)
customer_reviews.author: Ioan Alexandru Baragau

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality was quite poor, and these only worked intermittently. Moving the cable near the headphones caused the sound to cut out - obviously defective. Will return and try another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Cal

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Best headphones I've ever used. Super comfy and great quality sound. I use them in the office and colleagues can't hear what I'm listening to at all.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Foldable and sturdy. Looks good without looking like a weird alien ...
customer_reviews.text: I wish i got these sooner. Foldable and sturdy. Looks good without looking like a weird alien with massive bug ears. Sound is great too and enough to keep most of the background noise out when on the tube.
customer_reviews.author: sim

customer_reviews.title: good for price and have made my train journeys so ...
customer_reviews.text: good for price and have made my train journeys so much better. they are comfortable and durable (well 1 month old so far). recomended
customer_reviews.author: paul

customer_reviews.title: Stylish headphones, great value
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these as I wanted a set of wireless headphones for calls whilst wfh and general listening around the house but didn't want to spend too much money. A few weeks in and these have been perfect. They look great, decent call quality, great for audiobooks and podcasts, plus they muffle background sound very effectively.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Excellent and Bluetooth seems to work well. Battery life is very very good.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Mj Franklin

customer_reviews.title: I love these headphones
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones! They are really comfortable, look great, excellent sound quality. The features on these are also great - you can plug another pair of earphones/headphones into one side so they double as a headphone splitter! There is also a button on the wire that allows you to pause/skip songs, which is very handy. Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Molly Jones

customer_reviews.title: These broke after less than 7 days use
customer_reviews.text: These were great headphones... for about 6 days. They then just stopped working completely. Have tried resetting them, contacting the manufacturer, and can't seem to get them working again. Complete waste of money. Don't bother buying these. So so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Super happy with my new Urbanears headphones
customer_reviews.text: Super happy with my new Urbanears headphones! I owned a pair previously but wanted an upgrade and these are great. Design and sound is perfect and they fold easily. The microphone is a great add on to the upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Noelle

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones, but power connection broke after just 7 months
customer_reviews.text: A good pair of wireless headphones, well liked, right up to the point when the charging mechanism or power on/off broke after 7 months. The 'returns' option on my Amazon order does not exist, so getting a warranty repair will be difficult. Lesson = don't buy electrical items from Amazon if at all possible?
customer_reviews.author: Prosper MJ

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: Replacement for a black pair my girlfriend left on holiday, always great headphones, for the price you will struggle to get anything as good
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: MY NEW FAVOURITE THING
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THESE SO MUCH! super comfy, easy to control. I've had them for about 6 days so far and have used them every day- so far lasted on 1 charge!! So definitely accurate about the 30 hrs playback. The Tomato colour is so nice, matte finish and more pastel than the Beats red colour for example. Would recommend all day long.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, lovely fold up design
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for exam season and I absolutely love them! I love the colour and the way they can fold up is so handy for travelling but they still feel sturdy! Only slight downside is my ears would start to ache a little but that might just be because I was wearing them for 10ish hours each time!
customer_reviews.author: Sophie Budd

customer_reviews.title: Nice surprise.
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, nice deep bass and good midtones. Extremely comfortable for prolonged periods of use and nice snug fitting. They sound better than my old Beats.
customer_reviews.author: RikiOy

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad
customer_reviews.text: I can’t give any comment on the sound quality, because it’s my first time to have a headphone. I will say it’s not too bad, regarding the outlook and sound. I don’t need noise cancellation, because I only use it when in office, a quiet office.
customer_reviews.author: zekun

customer_reviews.title: Battery for days!
customer_reviews.text: The battery in these lasts me days, it's amazing! the sound quality I'm very pleased with too.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia Nock

customer_reviews.title: Excellent headphones
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my teenage daughter. They're perfect for her. Stylish. Good sound (personally I wouldn't buy them for myself as I prefer larger more bassy headphones, but these are perfect for her). She loves the ability to daisy chain another pair of headphones to them so she can listen with her friends.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice looking and good size - poor performance
customer_reviews.text: Tried 6/7 times to get them to pair with my iPhone and wasted a couple of hours with no luck - even after a call with Amazon tech help so gave up and sent them back - pity they look good and were a nic e size - bought some B7O ones instead - brilliant
customer_reviews.author: NR

customer_reviews.title: Great item!
customer_reviews.text: Second pair of these - great sound quality. Brought as a present and my daughter loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes the sound is cut. I don't know why. But really good product.
customer_reviews.author: Mercedes Vidal

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: great price, and long battery life, but personally it's good for convenience, and not so much if you're an audiophile, because sound is quite staticky/white noise-like for some songs with higher/lower pitches.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant product
customer_reviews.text: Had a pair before lasted years these are a great quality product for a great price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke after one use
customer_reviews.text: Used once then they broke. Only used in the house to try them out then the next time I went to use them they wouldn’t switch on. Returned
customer_reviews.author: Bex

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth doesn’t connect
customer_reviews.text: Bluetooth wouldn’t connect at all on multiple phones, ended up buying the Urbanista Seattle headphones instead
customer_reviews.author: Frances

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great sound my last pair lasted over 5 years of the Plattan 1 no problems with these and use them to and from work
customer_reviews.author: Bradc

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound and quality for the price. Better than some at twice the price.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Strangelove

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t even work
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality of these are absolutely terrible. The touch system where you change the volume and skip doesn’t even work, this is one of the worst headphones I’ve ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Karya

customer_reviews.title: Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones and ear warmers. Not noise cancelling but they do provide amazing sound for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Look great, easy to use, great sound quality!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my teenage son for Christmas and he loves them. They are really easy to use and have great sound quality even when answering telephone calls. Would definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: michelle lewis

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: First pair the batter wouldn't charge so had to return. Now the second pair won't connect to phone by Bluetooth. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Jack P.

customer_reviews.title: Received faulty product twice
customer_reviews.text: Had to return this item twice as both items I received were faulty. The first pair had severe sound defects and the second lasted about a week then would no longer charge. Really disappointed in this product considering the price. Will avoid this brand I’m future
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Not suitable for wireless usage, therefor not suitable for iPhone without an adaptor
customer_reviews.text: Was expecting it to be suitable for iPhone without the need of an adapter, thought it would be completely wireless since I had owned a different pair previously which was wireless
customer_reviews.author: Rahim

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money ... poor sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Had to get a replacement pair as 1st pair didn’t connect to Bluetooth Sound quality’s very poor Disappointing a my wired urbanears were better sound quality but broke quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Field

customer_reviews.title: Lovely stylish headphones
customer_reviews.text: Bought as gift for my daughter,chose as I have a pair and are great,very comfy and the sound is really good
customer_reviews.author: Sarahc

customer_reviews.title: These are not bluetooth headphones
customer_reviews.text: I really like these headphones. However, the description on Amazon in the More Info section stated they used Bluetooth connectivity, which is why I bought these. It's an error. These are wired headphones. So, they are being returned.
customer_reviews.author: L Roarty

customer_reviews.title: good sound and not too expensive
customer_reviews.text: lightweight, compact, good sound and not too expensive. excellent for drowning out the noise of crazy people on public transport
customer_reviews.author: spandau barry

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Was ages getting them to pair up, tried another phone same problem. Eventually paired, sounded good until I moved then the music stuttered endlessly. Can't rate battery life or noise cancellation. Returned for refund.
customer_reviews.author: HR arthur

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant at the price
customer_reviews.text: I love these. They sound great for the price, they look great, they pack down well and they feel really comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Piper

customer_reviews.title: Headphone
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are fantastic and very good quality highly recommend them
customer_reviews.author: Tracy lovell

customer_reviews.title: Thank you for this amazing Headphones Before buying it
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for this amazing Headphones Before buying it, keep in mind that these have a very strong bass. Some say it's unnatural, but personally, I love it. It gives a warm and intense feeling. Bass-lovers should definitely go for it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No BT
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these partly because they are stated to have bluetooth connection, however it appears that they don't which kind of sucks. Otherwise they're perfectly fine.
customer_reviews.author: Mr OJ Holgate

customer_reviews.title: Good.
customer_reviews.text: Good sound quality. It gets a bit uncomfortable if wearing for a long time. Maybe it's just me. Overall it's very good for this price.
customer_reviews.author: Laurynas

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing headphones. Really clear. Beautiful bass and clear mic. Can't recommend enough.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I think this is my 2nd pair of Urban Ears and they're great!
customer_reviews.author: Cherfaune

customer_reviews.title: Good but......
customer_reviews.text: Good quality great sound for the price but the headphones lasted just under a year with the loss of sound in one ear
customer_reviews.author: Abi moore

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality and battery life.
customer_reviews.text: Slightly complicated to turn off at times due to the toggle. But otherwise a comfortable pair of headphones with good sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent black headphones
customer_reviews.text: Bass isn’t what I was looking for. But overall decent look. The matt black makes it look so decent.
customer_reviews.author: Sadun

customer_reviews.title: Good but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: Really nice and comfortable. Good sound, bluetooth can drop out sometimes but usually comes back quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Green

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and ease of use.
customer_reviews.text: One of the most comfortable types of headphones out there.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Sound
customer_reviews.text: Like them and the way they look, would like them to go louder. I use them for pleasure.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia Theodosiou

customer_reviews.title: Great material, comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Love the style. The fold up and the material is cool. If only they were wireless.
customer_reviews.author: Krista M.

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: Really great sound for the price, lovely colour and they fold up pretty small so are portable
customer_reviews.author: Emi

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: Little quieter sound for my ears but that just means excellent purchase for someone who wants to protect
customer_reviews.author: Client d'Amazon

customer_reviews.title: But good sound and noice cancelling
customer_reviews.text: A bit to tight for my big head. But good sound and noice cancelling.
customer_reviews.author: Lena Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Headphones
customer_reviews.text: A decent pair of headphones for use on the move. Comfortable, adequate sound quality, and they keep my ears warm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Urbanears Plattan 2 Wired Headphones – Indigo
product_meta.description:
Colour Name:Indigo| Style Name:Plattan 2Plattan 2 is the grown-up version of an Urbanears classic, upgraded to deliver a next-level experience in sound and ergonomics. The 3D Hinge gives your headphones some impressive flexibility so they can adapt to the shape of your head for a perfect fit. Take your headphones wherever you go. Just fold them up, twist up the cord, and be on your merry way. Share your music with a best bud, or a full daisy chain of friends. Simply plug in another pair of headphones and enjoy. The built-in mic and remote lets you pick up calls and skip between tracks without missing a beat.

BOX CONTAINS
1 x Plattan 2 Headphones
feature_bullets: Portable - Take your headphones anywhere you go by folding them up and twisting the cord
Listen all day - Features a flexible 3D Hinge giving the headphone some impressive flexibility
30+ Hours - Listening time of 30+ hours and a sensitivity of 106 decibels
Hands-Free Talking - The built-in mic and remote lets you pick up calls and skip between tracks without missing a beat
Instant Music Sharing - Share your music with your friends, simply plug in another pair of headphones and enjoy

specifications.Customer reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
